languages.text: "Восславь Императора, ибо хворь твоя отступает. Благодари Лорд-капитана, что послал{mf||а} нас сюда".
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
languages.original_text: "Восславь Императора, ибо хворь твоя отступает. Благодари Лорд-капитана, что послал{mf||а} нас сюда".

traits.locale_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
"Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei der Imperator, dass sich Eure Krankheit bessert. Ein Glück, dass der Lord Captain uns hergeschickt hat."
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei der Imperator, dass sich Eure Krankheit bessert. Ein Glück, dass der Lord Captain uns hergeschickt hat."

languages.text: « Louez l'Empereur, car votre maladie régresse. Vous pouvez remercier {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de nous avoir envoyés ici. »
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."

traits.locale_text: « Louez l'Empereur, car votre maladie régresse. Vous pouvez remercier {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de nous avoir envoyés ici. »

languages.text: «Alaba al Emperador, pues tu dolencia está remitiendo. Da gracias a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán por habernos enviado».
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."

traits.locale_text: «Alaba al Emperador, pues tu dolencia está remitiendo. Da gracias a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán por habernos enviado».

languages.text: 「皇帝をたたえよ、お前の病気は治まりつつある。我らをここに遣わしてくれたロード・キャプテンに感謝するんだな」
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝をたたえよ、お前の病気は治まりつつある。我らをここに遣わしてくれたロード・キャプテンに感謝するんだな」

languages.text: “赞美帝皇，你的病已经在慢慢好转了。感谢舰长大人把我们送到这个地方。”
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."

traits.locale_text: “赞美帝皇，你的病已经在慢慢好转了。感谢舰长大人把我们送到这个地方。”

languages.text: "İmparator'a şükret, hastalığın geriliyor. Lord Kaptan'a da bizi buraya gönderdiği için minnet duy."
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, for your malady is receding. Thank the Lord Captain for sending us here."
